channel.title: [602] NEW-MysticPk [602] source+Client RELEASE
channel.description:
[CENTER] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12498660/cooltext5045959252.png[/img] A PvP world, with fully functional EP system, with working statuette drops. A FFA zone, where clans can have wars, and many other areas. Specials are almost at 100%. The combat system is unique aswell.
Download: * *
Credits: lover854 Sanity
Old Runescape login interface, showing your kills, deaths, KDR, and PkP Fully working In-game high scores, ranking is based on amount of kills. Teleports in spell books are disabled Boss teleports can be located my talking to an NPC. 100% working clue scrolls Thieving stalls have a varied award amount Dragon darts added EP system, with custom interface PvP artifacts are awarded once you get a kill at 100EP Level changing in PvP zones Bones on altar Click leveling Added 525/602 Anims 100% D claws 100% PvP specs 97% All other specs 20+ Dialouges added Items on death 90% done (need to create new interface) Varrok Multi PvP based slayer system Ancient curses Home Dueling Dailies
PIC's: [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12498660/aaaaahi.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12498660/equipsc.png[/img] [img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/12498660/picsu.png[/img]
[/CENTER]

[CENTER]

A PvP world, with fully functional EP system, with working statuette drops. A FFA zone, where clans can have wars, and many other areas.
Specials are almost at 100%.
The combat system is unique aswell.

Download:

*

Credits:
lover854
Sanity

Old Runescape login interface, showing your kills, deaths, KDR, and PkP
Fully working In-game high scores, ranking is based on amount of kills.
Teleports in spell books are disabled
Boss teleports can be located my talking to an NPC.
100% working clue scrolls
Thieving stalls have a varied award amount
Dragon darts added
EP system, with custom interface
PvP artifacts are awarded once you get a kill at 100EP
Level changing in PvP zones
Bones on altar
Click leveling
Added 525/602 Anims
100% D claws
100% PvP specs
97% All other specs
20+ Dialouges added
Items on death 90% done (need to create new interface)
Varrok Multi
PvP based slayer system
Ancient curses
Home Dueling
